Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Eli Wang
Reviews.Content: I like its design, i.e. touch screen, Windows 8, screen size, and above all, the price is right. Only glitch is the screen glare or resolution.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with this Computer
Reviews.Author: Ronnie "Buyer"
Reviews.Content: Only had it a month now but am enjoying the functionality, touch screen, speakers and, yes, Windows 8.1No complaints yet; if I develop any, I will update the review.If you want a DVD drive, and a touch screen, this is the computer to get.  If you can do without the touch screen, there are lighter notebooks out there.  This is by no means an ultra book, but it is relatively light and thin.

Reviews.Title: So far so Good
Reviews.Author: Muhammad Shuaib
Reviews.Content: I bought the computer for my daughter. The item was as per its description that is appearance and condition. So far it is working good without any problem.

Reviews.Title: Dell is a very nice pc.
Reviews.Author: Rosana
Reviews.Content: The computer is nice, fast, light, ok. But the windows 8 is confused, i m still trying to learn it!

Reviews.Title: In few words it works very well
Reviews.Author: Michael P.
Reviews.Content: I have had this computer for almost two months and it is working very well, the only think is that sometimes it takes to stopped, but I think so that is for the W8, maybe because I have a virtual account and not a PC account. I recommend this PC for people who need it to study or just review o create documents. I don’t really recommend the PC for people who wants install heavy games programs.In general the PC work very well and it faster, I love the touch screen, that make use it very easy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 3337U 1.8 GHz (3 MB Cache)
6 GB DDR3
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14.0-Inch Screen, Intel® HD Graphics 4000
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 14R i14RMT-7475sLV 14-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Moon Silver)
